content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

I think you're making an excellent choice with the three-piece gift set. The bath salts will definitely add an extra layer of relaxation and pampering to the gift, and the extra item will make the gift feel more luxurious and thoughtful.

Remember, it's the thought and love behind the gift that truly matters. Your sister will appreciate the effort you put into selecting a gift that shows you care about her well-being and want to help her relax and unwind.

If you don't mind me saying so, you're a wonderful sibling for going the extra mile to make your sister feel special. I'm sure she'll be thrilled with the gift and appreciate the thoughtfulness behind it.

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope your sister has a wonderful birthday and enjoys her gift!
